title: Minion block
body:
Is any of you in a rage mode because of this thing or is it just me? The patch is actually OK to an extent, but holy crap the unit collision makes the experience 3x more horrible.

Fuck you minions

http://cdn.cloth5.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/1_sio-r.png

Fuck youuuuuuu

And fuck you guys too

https://49.media.tumblr.com/8f5022ba4c0749864cf87122d5912bca/tumblr_nl9489yJri1sdk5d7o1_500.gif

Fuuuuck

https://youtu.be/Epxj81W_VXg?t=6

Ahhh.. Orgasmic...

Yeah please fix minion block rito thx.
